property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Sharp Thorns: [Passage Attack] [Dice=2] [Creatures which pass through this wall, receive a number of attacks equal to their Level -1. Examples: A Level 3 creature is attacked twice, a Level 1 is not attacked.] [Unavoidable]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Passage Attacks, Blocks LOS, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: Creatures of Level 2 or higher must spend a full action to move through the Wall of Thorns.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Blocks LOS, Passage Attacks, Incorporeal, Extendable, Flame Immunity, Hydro +3

property.name: Text
property.value: Hydro attacks gain the Ethereal trait when attacking Wall of Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once each round, before or after any friendly creature's Action Phase, you may give a Living creature Armor +1 or the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round. or you may heal 1 damage from it. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: All animal creatures gain the Charge +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Restrained and gains the Unmovable trait. Tanglevine cannot target creatures with the Flying or Uncontainable traits. Ranged attacks cannot target Tanglevine. [Restrained] [Unmovable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, you may choose and do one of these: Re-roll a Defense or Escape roll that you just rolled, or, if a friendly creature is the defender of an attack, you can re-roll the effect roll or all of the attack dice from that attack, Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Text
property.value: As long as you control any of these animal creatures, your Mage gains these traits and abilities: Canine = Melee +1, Reptile = Armor +1, Bear = Tough -2, Ape = Climbing, Cat = Elusive.

property.name: Text
property.value: All animal creature's melee attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is activated, you may pay 1 mana. If you do, Gremlin gains the Fast trait until the end of round, and each move action he takes this round is a Teleport to the next zone.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Flameblast: [Full] [Ranged:1-1] [Flame] [Dice=3] [d12] [5-9 = Burn; 10+ = 2 Burn] [Defrost] Hell Trident: [Quick] [Melee] [Flame] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-10 = Burn; 11+ = 2 Burn] [Defrost]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Sword: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] Redeeming Sacrifice: [Full] [Heal] [Dice=6] [Heal any Living creature in the arena the amount rolled. Then, destroy Gray Angel]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Staff: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] Healing Light: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Heal] [Dice=1] [Heal target Living Creature the amount rolled.]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Leeching Bite: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] [Mana Drain +1] Gorging Bite: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=3] [Mana Drain +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is activated, you may pay 1 mana to give her the Flying trait until the end of her Action Phase.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Windstorm: [Quick] [Melee] [Wind] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-10 = Push; 11+ = Push & Daze] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Incorporeal]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Flying trait. [Flying]

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this creature makes a non-spell ranged or melee attack, it rolls 2 fewer attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Reverse Attack during the Avoid Attack Step. The attack is avoided and then redirected back to the attacker, who now becomes the target of that attack for the next 2 steps (Roll Dice and Damage and Effects). Then, destroy Reverse Attack. If the attack is Unavoidable, destroy Reverse Attack without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Melee +2 trait. [Melee +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each round, the first time this creature makes a melee or ranged attack, its controller must pay 2 mana during the Declare Attack Step, or else the attack is canceled. Pacify does not affect counterstrikes.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Block during the Avoid Attack Step. Block counts as a Defense, and the attack is avoided. Then, destroy Block. If the attack is Unavoidable, destroy Block without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Finite Life trait. [Finite Life]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Slow trait. [Slow]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Upkeep +2 trait. [Upkeep +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Ranged +1 trait. [Ranged +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Elusive trait. [Elusive]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature loses the Flying trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, this creature receives 2 direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Aegis 1 trait. [Aegis 1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmonize can only target an object that has the Channeling attribute. This object gains Channeling +1. [Channeling +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in this zone gain the Aegis 1 trait. [Aegis 1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Hellfire Trap can only target a zone without enemy creatures. When an enemy creature enters the zone, you must reveal Hellfire Trap. Hellfire Trap immediately attacks that creature. Then, destroy Hellfire Trap.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Damage Barrier.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. This does not affect creatures with the Uncontainable trait. [Unmovable] [Restrained]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Defense, which is unaffected by conditions on this creature, including Incapacitated, Restrained, and Daze. [Defense 8+ 1x No Melee]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Defense, which is unaffected by conditions on this creature, including Incapacitated, Restrained, and Daze. [Defense 8+ 1x No Ranged]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Reverse Magic during the Counter Spell Step. You take control of that spell. Redirect it back to the caster, who now becomes the target of the spell. You control that spell, and may make new choices, paying additional mana costs if any. Then, destroy Reverse Magic.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Regenerate 2 trait. [Regenerate 2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When Decoy is revealed, destroy it. If this spell is destroyed, even if it has not been revealed, its controller gains 2 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: Teleport Trap can only target a zone without enemy creatures. When an enemy creature enters the zone, you must reveal Teleport Trap. That creature is immediately teleported to a zone of your choice, up to 2 zones away. Then, destroy Teleport Trap.

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures gain +1 attack die when attacking this creature. Creatures can only gain this bonus for the first attack they make each round against this creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attacks gain the Vampiric trait. [Vampiric]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's quick action melee attacks gain the Counterstrike trait. The first time it makes a Counterstrike attack, destroy Retaliate. [Counterstrike]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature casts a quick spell, you must reveal Jinx during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is canceled and is returned to its owner's spellbook. Any mana spent to cast that spell is refunded to the caster's mana supply. Then, destroy Jinx.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Incapacitated, and gains Armor +6. You cannot reveal Turn to Stone during an action, such as an attack or spell. [Incapacitated] [Armor +6]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Nullify during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is countered. Then, destroy Nullify.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains a Defense. [Defense 7+ 1x No Ranged]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Flame -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Flame -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic attack spell from your spellbook to Elemental Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic incantation spell from your spellbook to Mage Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target gains the Fast and Charge +1 traits until the end of the round. [Fast] [Charge]

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Dissolve, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. X = equipment's casting cost. Then, destroy the chosen equipment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy the target. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Piercing +3 trait. [Piercing +3]

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a creature summoned this round. Flip target creature's action marker to the active side. That creature may act normally this round. You can only cast this one time per round on the same creature. X = target's Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal each friendly Living creature in the target zone the amount rolled on 5 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 8 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: The next time this round the target creature makes a non-countrstrike melee attack, at the end of that action it may immediately make a quick action melee attack. This extra attack counts as part of the same attack action. Only one Battle Fury spell may be cast per round on the same creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roll 8 attack dice. The target loses that much mana from his mana supply. The caster gains mana equal to the mana lost.

property.name: Text
property.value: The target receives 5 attack dice of direct damage. The caster also heals damage equal to the damage received by the target creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Pushed 1 zone in the direction of your choice. This will not Push it through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, unless you pay an additional 3 mana when this spell is cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy all enchantments attached to target object (both hidden and revealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Incapacitated until the beginning of its next Action Phase, or until the end of the round, whichever comes first. Knockdown has no effect on Unmovable creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Unavoidable trait. [Unavoidable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove as many poison conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed poison enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal cost) for each one.

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly animal creatures in the arena gain the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target falls asleep. Place a Sleep condition marker on it. Does not affect creatures with Psychic Immunity. Look up the value of X below: Level 1 = 4 mana Level 2 = 5 mana Level 3 = 6 mana Add 2 mana to the cost for each Level beyond 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 5 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Explode, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. X = 6 + the equipment's casting cost. Destroy the choosen equipment. Then, Explode makes the above flame attack against the target Mage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target hidden enchantment. Controller of target enchantment cannot reveal the enchantment once Seeking Dispel has been cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Teleported to the target zone. X = 3 mana per zone moved away from its current zone. You must pay at least 3 mana even if the target is teleported into the same zone. This does not count as a move action for the creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Vampiric and Piercing +1 traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Teleport target creature out of the arena. Place 3 Banish tokens on it. Remove 1 Banish token each Upkeep Phase. When the final token is removed, return the creature to the last zone it was in. While out of the arena, this creature cannot take any action, its action marker remains unchanged, and it can only be affected by attached spells, conditions, or its own traits and abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target gains the Elusive trait until the end of the round. [Elusive]

property.name: Text
property.value: Move target enchantment you control to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range and LoS. X = 1 if the enchantment is hidden, or the Level of the enchantment if it is revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move target enchantment to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range and LoS. You now control that enchantment. X = the casting & reveal cost of target enchantment, plus you pay the casting & reveal cost of attaching it to the new target (as if you just cast and revealed the spell).
